edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.repository.jena

Class JenaRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.repository.CollectedRepository
      • edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.repository.jena.JenaRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnnotationRepository, BackupRepository, ContainerRepository, TransactionRepository, WapObjectRepository

    @Repository
public class JenaRepository
extends CollectedRepository
    The Jena repository implementation.
    IMPORTANT: Only the externally called functions are intercepted! Make sure to add @JenaTransaction Annotation with the needed Type in front of every called Method.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Matthias Dressel, Michael Hitzker, Markus Hoefler, Andreas Loeffler, Timo Schmidt
